Title: Deconstruction
Description:
Scouts are reporting a large number of constructs patrolling outside of Dawnseeker Promontory.

If left unchecked they will pose a considerable threat should the Sunreavers mount an attack.

The only answer is a preemptive strike. We'll destroy them before they can attack us!
ObjectivesText: Destroy 3 Sunreaver Constructs outside of Dawnseeker Promontory.
